Uses of Interface
org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels.IPaymentChannelClient.ClientChannelProperties

  • Packages that use IPaymentChannelClient.ClientChannelProperties 
    Package Description
    org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels
    Micropayment channels allow for rapid tiny payments to be made to a third party once a channel has been set up, using some of the advanced features of the Bitcoin protocol.

    • Uses of IPaymentChannelClient.ClientChannelProperties in org.bitcoinj.protocols.channels
